create_password_page.title: Welcome to Echo
create_password_page.text: Please, create password that will be used to unlock the app from this device. Echo Desktop Wallet does not store backups of the account password, so in case of losing your password you will need to reset it.

default_settings_page.text_to_custom_settings: Or use your own WIF or Public Key

custom_settings_page.text: You can use your own WIF or Public Key:

checkboxes.first: I understand that I will lose access to my funds if I loose my WIF
checkboxes.second: I understand no one can recover my WIF if I lose or forget it
checkboxes.third: I have written down or otherwise stored my WIF

default_settings_section.title: Default settings
default_settings_section.text_pt1: Register for free by public registrar.
default_settings_section.text_pt2: Delegation to participate in the consensus will be granted to public registrar.

parent_account_section.title: Parent account
parent_account_section.text: Register with an existing account. The selected account will be charged fee for account creation.
parent_account_section.dont_have_acc_text_pt2: You can generate a new account on your own. Log in your another wallet account beforehand to do so

ip_url_section.title: IP/URL
ip_url_section.text: Register a new account through a running node.
ip_url_section.popup: You can save IP or URL to use it next time

stable_coins.title: Pegged Assets
stable_coins.popup_info: Assets from Sidechains, e.g. Bitcoin or Ethereum, converted to eBTC and eETH and burned back to BTC and ETH when withdrawing to an original sidechain.

to_input.title: TO
to_input.placeholder: Account ID, Account Name or Address

receive_payment.title: RECEIVE PAYMENT

echo.title: ECHO NETWORK
echo.description_part1: Fill in payment information to get a unique QR code.
echo.description_part2: You can use several addresses referring to one account for different targets.

no_address_page.description: Please, allow some time for address generation as it may take up to one hour. It will appear on this page when generated.

wait_address_page.description: Please, allow some time for address generation as it may take up to one hour. It will appear on this page when generated.

complete_address_page.info: Fill in payment information to get a unique QR code.
complete_address_page.warning_message_pt3: to get BTC or send it within ECHO Network.

no_address_page.description: Please, allow some time for address generation as it may take up to 5 minutes. It will appear on this page when generated.

wait_address_page.description: Please, allow some time for address generation as it may take up to 5 minutes. It will appear on this page when generated.

complete_address_page.info: Fill in payment information to get a unique QR code.
complete_address_page.wait_text: However, we strongly recommend that you wait up to 5 minutes to eliminate potential Ethereum's fork.
complete_address_page.warning_message_pt3: to get ETH or send it within ECHO Network.

receive_payment.qr_description: QR code and link are generated automatically. You can copy it and send to someone for payment.

frozen_funds.title: Frozen Funds
frozen_funds.subtitle: Freeze Funds
frozen_funds.popup_header_text: Frozen funds allow you to get bigger reward for participating in blocks creation.

frozen_funds_list.title: Frozen amounts
frozen_funds_list.description: The sum you freeze will affect the reward for participating in blocks creation when re-calculated with the coefficient (the longer the period, the bigger reward you receive).
frozen_funds_list.popup_text: This is the coefficient that will be used to calculate the reward for participating in blocks creation.

smart_contract_page.title: Smart Contracts
smart_contract_page.empty_text: Start watch contract or create a new one

input_abi.title_pt2: (If you insert ABI, contract will add to watchlist)

eth_accuracy.title: ETH Accuracy:
eth_accuracy.popup_text: The option allows to interpret ECHO assets as ETH. The amount will be automatically recalculated to the 1e18 precision.

supported_assets.title: Supported assets:
supported_assets.popup_text: You can specify assets to be supported by your contract.

deploying_amount.title: Deploying amount:
deploying_amount.popup_text: You can specify the amount to be sent with contract creation. Leave blank if the constructor of your contract is not payable.

backup_and_permissions_page.title: Backup and Permissions
backup_and_permissions_page.threshold_popup: You can split authority to sign a transaction by setting threshold. Total weight of all the keys in the wallet must be equal or more than threshold to sign a transaction.

echorand_key_section.title: EchoRand Key
echorand_key_section.info: EchoRand Key is used for participating in blocks generation and signing sidechain transactions by committee members.

view_mode.info: Making a backup of your keys helps ensure you can always maintain access to your funds. Anyone having access to your keys will take full control of the funds, so we strongly recommend storing it offline in a secure place.

edit_mode.info: The settings below allow you to specify the keys and / or accounts, whose signatures will be necessary to send a transaction from your account. Using threshold and weight you can separate access to an account between several keys and / or accounts.

add_buttons_section.add_acc_tooltip: Grant access for sending transactions to another account
add_buttons_section.add_key_tooltip: Add an additional key to sign transactions

add_connection_page.title: Add connection
add_connection_page.agree_switch_checkbox: Switch to this Network upon creating

key_warning.text: Total weight of all the keys won't be enough to sign a transaction.

eth_warning.text: Your ethereum address is yet not fully confirmed. Wait up to 5 minutes

local_node.title: Local Node
local_node.popup_info: Node running locally on your PC, should be synchronized with Remote Node and enables participation in consensus.

remote_node.title: Remote Node
remote_node.popup_info: Node accessible remotely on the Web. Insufficient for participation in consensus.

modal_accept_incoming_connection.title_pt1: Do you want the application “Echo Wallet”
modal_accept_incoming_connection.subtitle_pt2: enjoy all the benefits of running local node *
modal_accept_incoming_connection.list_pt4_1: Run on your PC locally and
modal_accept_incoming_connection.footer: * This setting can be changed in the Firewall pane of Security & Privacy preferences anytime.

modal_accept_running_node.title: Run local node
modal_accept_running_node.text_pt1: You need to accept incoming network connections
modal_accept_running_node.text_pt2: so as to run local node

modal_add_proposal_wif.title: Would you like to add other keys now?
modal_add_proposal_wif.text_pt1: Your account settings require more than one key to sign a transaction.
modal_add_proposal_wif.text_pt2: You can add more keys now or later on the Backup and Permissions page.

wif_input.title: WIF (optional)
wif_input.warnig: Warning: Anyone who has this key can steal all your Echo assets and this key can never be recovered if you lose it.

backup_data_field.title: Backup data
backup_data_field.warning: Warning: Anyone who has access to your WIF can steal all your Echo assets and this key can never be recovered if you lose it.

modal_confirm_editin_of_permissions.title: Please, confirm applying changes
modal_confirm_editin_of_permissions.warning_key_message: If these changes are applied, you won't have enough keys to sign transactions. Do you want to proceed?
modal_confirm_editin_of_permissions.echorand_warning_message: You removed your EchoRand Key and after submitting this action you will lose access to it.

modal_create_btc_address.title: Create BTC address
modal_create_btc_address.text: To create your new BTC Address, please, provide your external backup BTC address. Backup BTC address is needed to be able to withhold a sent transaction to ECHO network during the first 24 hours after the transaction being made.
modal_create_btc_address.warning: Submit your backup BTC address above.

modal_create_echo_address.title: Create address name
modal_create_echo_address.text: You can use several addresses referring to one account for different targets. Please create address name for a new one.
modal_create_echo_address.warning: Warning: Please note, address names are visible for blockchain network participants.

modal_edit_permissions.title: Edit Mode Warning
modal_edit_permissions.text: Please, keep in mind that uncontrolled changes may lead to loosing access to the wallet or restricting your actions within it. Be careful with editing permissions and adding the accounts to manage the wallet, ensuring that you grant permissions only to the accounts you trust.
modal_edit_permissions.checkbox_text: I have read and understood the possible consequences of editing

modal_erc20_to_watch_list.title: Do you want to add ERC20 token to watch list?

modal_confirm_logout.title: Confirm logout
modal_confirm_logout.subtitle: You will be signed out of your account.

modal_tokens.title: Add ERC20 token to watch list

wif_input.title: WIF *
wif_input.warning: * Warning: Anyone who has this key can steal all your Echo assets and this key can never be recovered if you lose it.

modal_wipe.title: Your password cannot be restored
modal_wipe.text: You can clear your account data from Echo Desktop and set a new password. If you do, you wil lose access to the accounts you’ve logged into. You will need to log into them again, after you have set a new password.
modal_wipe.checkbox_text: I understand the Echo Desktop does not store backups of my account keys, and I will lose access to them  by clearing my account data

modal_node_coming_soon.title: Local node
modal_node_coming_soon.text: Local node will be available in future releases.

modal_auto_run_local_node.title: Unlock Wallet to run local node

errors.trx_dont_comp_by_lose_connection: transaction wasn't completed. Please, check your connection.
errors.private_key_error: Private key was not imported in Echo Desktop Wallet

amount_input.title: Amount
amount_input.warning_message_pt5: or send it within ECHO Network.

account_errors.empty_account_error: Account name should not be empty
account_errors.account_creation_error: Account creation error. Please, try again later
account_errors.account_import_error: Account importing error. Please, try again later
account_errors.account_name_too_big_error: Account name should be shorter then 63 symbols.
account_errors.account_not_contain_req_symbols: Account name should contain digit, number, dash or consist only of consonants
account_errors.account_segment_beginning_error: Each account segment should start with a latin letter.
account_errors.account_segment_contains_error: Each account segment should have only latin letters, digits, or dashes.
account_errors.account_segment_dash_error: Each account segment should have only one dash in a row.
account_errors.account_segment_ending_error: Each account segment should end with a latin letter or digit.

amount_errors.incorrect_input_error: Amount must contain only digits and dot
amount_errors.send_to_yourself_error: You can not send funds to yourself
amount_errors.send_from_inactive_error: You can not send funds from inactive account

contract_errors.empty_contract_error: Contract id should not be empty
contract_errors.empty_id_error: Account ID field shouldn't be empty
contract_errors.empty_name_error: Contract name should not be empty
contract_errors.empty_symbol_error: Contract symbol should exist and not be empty
contract_errors.invalid_precision_error: Contract precision should exist and being bigger or equal than zero
contract_errors.name_to_short_error: Contract name must be 2 characters or more
contract_errors.name_to_large_error: Contract name must be 16 characters or less
contract_errors.assets_not_equal_error: Amount asset should be equal to supported asset
contract_errors.fee_in_not_payable_error: Can't calculate fee. Looks like your contract has no payable constructor.
contract_errors.empty_abi_error: Contract ABI should not be empty
contract_errors.zero_fee_pool_error: Please, replenish Fee Pool Balance first

contract_call_errors.less_min_value_error: input is less than min value
contract_call_errors.bytes_not_integer_error: bytes count is not a integer

contract_code_errors.code_symbols_count_error: code should include an even count of symbol

fee_errors.pool_balance_less_amount_error: Current fee pool balance is less than fee amount

keys_errors.user_invalid_priv_error: You have an invalid private key
keys_errors.keys_dont_match_error: Invalide private key for current public key

network_errors.empty_network_name: Network name should not be empty
network_errors.name_too_short_error: Network name must be 2 characters or more
network_errors.name_too_large_error: Network name must be 32 characters or less
network_errors.network_incorrect_symbols_error: Network name should have only latin letters, numbers, dots, underscores and spaces
network_errors.network_req_symbols_error: Network address should be start with 'ws://' or 'wss://'

node_errors.invalid_chacin_id_error: Chain id is not correct. Check your network node

passowd_errors.password_length_error: Password should have only latin letters from 6 to 32 characters
passowd_errors.no_uppercase_error: Password should have one latin uppercase letter
passowd_errors.no_lowercase_error: Password should have one latin lowercase letter

sign_errors.not_enough_threshold_error: Threshold is greater than the sum of keys weight available in Echo Desktop

validate_value_errors.should_be_in_8_steps: various sizes should be in in steps of 8
validate_value_errors.should_be_object_id: value should be in object id format
validate_value_errors.should_be_hex: value should be a hex string
